name: MenuAcceleratorCallbackBinding
desc: An [InheritedWidget] that provides a descendant [MenuAcceleratorLabel] with the function to invoke when the accelerator is pressed.

fields.name: onInvoke
fields.desc: The function that pressing the accelerator defined in a descendant [MenuAcceleratorLabel] will invoke.

fields.name: hasSubmenu
fields.desc: Whether or not the associated label will host its own submenu or not.
